text: What time does the parking lot close?
What is the average cost for a personal trainer at your gym, and how many sessions would I need to see results?
I want to learn a new language, how long should I practice daily and what are some good resources to get started with language learning?
My flight was cancelled and I won't be able to make it to my scheduled facial appointment, can you please help me reschedule?
If you're running late and can't make it to the check-in desk on time, you can do it electronically using the app.
Is it possible to check-in late at night? What time does the fitness center close?
I need to find a hotel for next month for two nights and also check the availability of a rental car for the same dates.
Is there a possibility of reserving a room with a bathtub and a hairdryer?
I heard that there's a new parking lot opened nearby, could you provide me with more details?
If I arrive early, will the check-in process be faster, and do I need to pay any extra cost for it?
Can you provide me with a quote for a deep tissue massage, and what types of oils do you use in your aromatherapy treatments?
I have a booking at a restaurant, but I'm not sure if it's still existing, can you please check that for me?
Is there a setup fee for booking a private room in this restaurant?
How do I activate my new credit card and set up automatic payments? Also, can you please check if there are any good travel deals available for my next vacation?
I need to buy groceries and fill up gas on my way home from work.
I want to cancel my existing booking but I also want to know if the cancellation fee can be waived off.
I started using a new app for my workouts, and it's really making a difference in my fitness routine.
Could you schedule a meeting with my boss for next Tuesday and send a follow-up email to our client about the status of their project?
Could you provide more information on your pet restrictions and any fees associated with bringing a pet to your hotel?
Hi there. I think something was stolen from my room during my stay, and I wanted to report it before checking out.
What's the restaurant's phone number? I need to make a booking for a party of six and request info about the existing happy hour deals.
How much time do I have before I reach my limit for the day and need to check out?
Can you book a room for me with a balcony and air conditioning?
Could you make me a reservation for dinner tonight and open the curtains in my room?
I would like to rent a car for the weekend and also need recommendations for nearby hiking trails and campgrounds.
The faucet in the bathroom is broken, and I need housekeeping to bring more shampoo.
Can you recommend a good restaurant near me that's open for breakfast tomorrow morning?
Is there parking available for RVs, and how much does it cost for an hour of parking?
I need to open a new account so I can book a flight reservation for my upcoming vacation.
I'm curious about how to invest in stocks and what risks are involved.
Can you help me activate my new credit card with a higher limit?
How to change my phone number in the account settings?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand you. Can you repeat that, please?
Can you please book a table for two at the Italian restaurant on Main Street, and also remind me to buy milk on my way home?
I want to apply for a loan and open a new bank account.
Can you remind me to call my mom at 4 pm and also set a timer for 30 minutes for my laundry?
I missed what you said earlier. Can you repeat it one more time?
Can you order a pizza for me tonight and also set a reminder to call my doctor tomorrow morning?
Can you tell me the latest time I can check-in tonight?
I would like to make a booking for a different date and also change the number of rooms I'm reserving, could you help me with both changes?
Let's catch up again soon, but I have to end the call now.
Could you provide me with the schedule of the adapted fitness classes that are available in the gym?
Hi, I need your help to make a hotel reservation for my upcoming trip to Paris and also apply for a visa to travel there, can you guide me through the process?
I accidentally closed my account, can I get a refund on the balance remaining?
I want to buy a new phone and also find out the nearest location of the Apple store.
I made a mistake on the dates for my rental car reservation, how can I change it?
There seems to be something wrong with the air conditioning in my room, could you change me to another room with better air conditioning?
I need your assistance to open a new email account and also to book tickets for the upcoming music concert in town.
I'm looking for a new phone, can you recommend one that has a good camera and long battery life?
Can you help me make an appointment at the dentist for a teeth cleaning?
Could you assist me in opening a new account and making a hotel reservation for my upcoming trip?
I heard there's a new pet store opening up in town, do you have any information on it?
Hello there! I would like to know the price range of the room service options.
I have some questions regarding a package deal for a spa weekend getaway. Can you please connect me to someone who can assist me?" (handoff, spa)

I've been to that restaurant before and I loved the food.
I have a complaint about the food I ordered through the room service. Can you transfer me to the manager's office?
My kitchen is really messy and I also need the trash taken out.
I need to park my motorcycle for a few hours. Do you know if there are any designated motorcycle parking spots in this area?
Thank you for your help, do you happen to know what time the store closes?
I can't seem to connect to the wifi network on my phone, is there an issue?
The cost is higher than I expected, can you tell me why? [intents: more_higher_after, request_info]
Could you book a flight to Paris on June 15th for two people and also reserve a hotel room for four nights?
Could you provide me with information about the ingredients used in your dishes, as well as any possible allergens present?
Can you tell me if the hotel has any accessible rooms? Also, what is your cancellation policy? [accesibility, request_info]

Can you recommend a good book to read? And could you also remind me to buy milk on my way home?

I'm sorry, but I need to cancel my booking for tomorrow because of a family emergency.
I would like to order a pizza and also check the weather forecast for tomorrow.

Can I request a late-night snack and ask for extra towels to be delivered to my room?
I am confirmed for the booking, please also activate my account.
I'm interested in learning more about yoga and meditation but I'm not sure where to start, can you suggest some beginner-friendly classes or resources that can help me get started?

I have to attend a conference next week and also need to pick up the dry cleaning from the laundry by tomorrow afternoon.
I want to start exercising more regularly and also learn how to cook new recipes.
Can you connect me to a spa specialist, please? I need to book an appointment." (handoff, spa)
I need to cancel my booking for next week and make a new reservation for the following week.
What's on my calendar for tomorrow and can you book a table at a sushi restaurant for Saturday night?
Can you let me know what documents are needed for the application process and also if there are any specific eligibility criteria?

Is there a swimming pool at the gym, and can you let me know if there is a smoothie bar at the gym?
Please remind me to call Susan tomorrow, but also add bread to my grocery list.
I can't find my phone anywhere, do you think it's possible that someone already took it?
I'm calling to follow up on the booking that was made last week, is everything in place for the reservation?
I would like to order takeout from the Indian restaurant that I visited last week, can you tell me their phone number?
I have a booking for dinner tonight, but I need to remove one person from the reservation. Also, can you tell me if there are any cancelation charges if I decide to cancel the booking altogether?
Alright, it was great talking to you. I guess I'll talk to you later then. [end_call]
Could you please send someone from the room service to fix the broken AC in my room?
Could you tell me if there are any restaurants in the area that are off-leash dog friendly?

Please book a table for two at the Italian restaurant on Friday evening and also tell me the weather forecast for the weekend.
I made a booking over the phone, but I think there was a mistake with the dates.

I need to cancel my reservation, but I'm not sure if there will be a cancellation fee. Can you tell me how much it would be?
Can you tell me if there's a parking facility available near this place?

Hi, I was wondering if you could give me some information on the parking garage, and if it's open 24/7?
Can you help me set up the room service to make sure my dinner arrives by 7 pm?
I don't think a sound system is necessary in the room, thank you.
I need to make a reservation for the restaurant and open the windows in my room, please.

I'm interested in making a reservation at your hotel, but can you tell me about any new amenities you have added recently?

Can you schedule a meeting for next Wednesday at 2 PM and also order lunch from the pizza place down the street?
Sorry, could you repeat that last sentence again?

I would like to schedule a haircut and also ask about availability for a pedicure next week.
How much does a gym membership cost, and can you tell me if there are any specials running currently?

The air conditioning in my room is not working and there are also no toiletries in the bathroom.

There is an issue with my existing booking, and I need your help to change it as soon as possible.

I'd like to book a room with a minibar and activate the complimentary breakfast option.

Can you order a large pepperoni pizza for delivery and set a reminder for me to call my mom at 7pm tonight?
I want to make a booking, but first, can you affirm that the flight times have not changed?
I'm sorry, I don't think that's what happened.
Could you please make the bed and provide me with some extra hangers in the closet?
Sorry to cut this short but I have to go. Talk to you later!
Can you look up a recipe for dinner tonight and tell me what ingredients we need to buy at the store?
Would you mind picking up my dry cleaning and dropping off a package at the post office on your way back?
I would like to schedule an appointment to get a haircut and purchase some hair products while I am there.
I need to make a reservation at the restaurant and ask about the parking options.

Call my sister and remind me to pick up groceries on my way home.

I'm having trouble connecting to wifi, it seems to be not working.
Can you tell me what time I should check out of the hotel in the morning and whether there's a breakfast option available?
Add eggs, milk, and bread to my grocery list and also play some relaxing music.
Can you recommend a good Italian restaurant near me that's open for lunch today and takes reservations for a party of six?
I want to order a pizza for delivery and pay by credit card.
